name: Soopah Player 2
description:
There is no one like Player 1!
So self-confident, athletic, marvelous, heroic, famous, lovable, and... 
That is it, end of history. 
Go now and play our game! 

Oh, really?! Do you want to know more about Player 2? 
Player 2 is just the second, there is no point in talking about him.
Ok, ok, you have a point there...
Let's see what I can say about Player 2! 
There is something you should know about this little boy. 
He, somehow, is always in the way of Player 1 epic adventures. I'm so jealous! 
Player 1 is really fantastic for letting that little 2 follow him wherever he goes. 

Go on and discover by yourself about Player 2! 

Controls: 
-WASD/ Arrows
-Joystick (Better Feeling) 
Press Space - Throw player
Press  Ctrl - Pickup/Drop

Actions:
 Pickup/Drop
Throw Player 1
Open Door

Victory Condition: 
Player 1 must make his way from point A to point B. 

Loss Condition:
Player 1 goes hang out with his friend.

This is an entry for the 2020 GMTK game jam.
